short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Demos of Sprite Basic Compiler, HTML5 game engine with Web Gl Renderer and Physic Engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
These demos shows the capabalities of Sprite Basic Compiler. Unlike Basic Interpreters, Sprite Basic produces compiled Basic code, thus extremly fast.
Available along the Basic Language is a Web GL Renderer and a Physic Engine allowing you to write commercial-class game applications.
You can develop on our cloud-based Integrated Development Environment at https://spritebasic.com (follow publisher website link on this page), as well as importing your game assets.
Over 120 functions, tutorials and API reference are available and creating an account is free. Applications can be compiled freely to Android, iOS, Windows Phone, Windows 10, Web Apps and Chrome Apps. Revenue generated from your applications publishing are royalties free and all yours.
